entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
